CustomField.description: URL to visit 'URL' is selected as the Target Object.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specify URL to navigate to. You have access to Line, Group, and Quote record fields dependent on selected location. Examples: http://www.salesforce.com, http://www.yoursite.com/{!Id}, or /{!SBQQ__Quote__c.Name}/{!SBQQ__YourCustomVar__c}
CustomField.label: URL
